resources.string: Wow, wow, wow. Congratulations for all your team, you are very close to the end of quest. Your finish point is where you started, you should make a selfie there. Good luck everybody

Together, we organize camps called \"Fun Holidays with God\" and various other camps. We participate in organizing walking pilgrimages and celebrations at the parish. We discover new acting talents by participating in plays. We develop comprehensively through clubs and other activities, which we have the opportunity to conduct to glorify God. Of course, we also enrich ourselves spiritually together with our spiritual guide, Father Mykita Ovchar, OSBM. \"Animators are one soul and one heart. Always remember, for Whom it beats!\"

The "Povodyrchyk" program was developed in 2021. The following individuals contributed to its development: - Artur Pashnyk (Full-Stack Developer, Photographer) - Viktor Klanitsa (Tester) - Dmytro Seniv (Tester) - Diana Semkovych (Photographer) - Oksana Pavliuk (Photographer) All rights to the "Povodyrchyk" program and images within the program belong to the "Василіянські Аніматори ІФ" community. Idea authors: Fr. Ambrose (Volodymyr) Kozak, OSBM and Artur Pashnyk.
Povodyrchyk 2021-2024
